name: Cititel Mid Valley Hotel
detail: I have been stayed in Malaysia, especially in Kuala Lumpur for many times, but only several nights were memorable. One of the memorable stays was in this hotel, The Cititel Mid Valley, Kuala Lumpur. I chose to stay in this hotel none other than because of its great accommodation and convenience. With only minutes away from important places such as Kuala Lumpur International Airport and access to Light Rail Transportation, my stay in the Cititel Mid Valley is surely worthwhile. Some say business and pleasure cannot be mix, but my stay in Cititel definitely change it!
area: Mid Valley / Bangsar,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: St. Giles Boulevard
detail: I've stayed here nearly 20 years and will always come back.
area: Mid Valley / Bangsar,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: Corus KLCC
detail: the corus hotel kuala lumpur, part of the uk-based corus hotel group, is one of the most popular 4 star business hotels in kuala lumpur. we are strategically nested in the excellent location of kuala lumpur city centre( klcc). the petronas twin towers are just heartbeat away from us with less than 5 minutes walking distance.
area: Kuala Lumpur City Centre,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: Sunway Putra Hotel Kuala Lumpur
detail: The Legend Hotel in Kuala Lumpur was an excellent experience, especially the staff. They were polite, smiled, and provided overall excellent service. The breakfast was very good and had a good variety of food. The hotel was a bit out of the main area, but that was probably good. The train was just outside the hotel. I enjoyed the daily newspaper and there was a good selection of TV channels. Had dinner in the restaurant and the food and service were excellent. I would stay there again on my next trip.
area: Chowkit / Putra WTC,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: The RuMa Hotel and Residences
detail: 1 of the best hotels i have stayed in , undoubtedly. Will come back again and again for sure. Thanks Ruma. ❤️
area: Kuala Lumpur City Centre,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: Impiana KLCC Hotel
detail: Hotel Impiana KLCC is a very good hotel with a perfect service. The location is absolutely great, being in the middle of Kuala Lumpur, directly in between shopping malls Suria KLCC and Pavilion. If you are travelling in Malaysia by car, Impiana is a good hotel to stay because they have free parking and a good parking lot next to the hotel. There is almost nothing negative about this hotel. Good price / quality ratio! We booked this hotel without and meals, so I cant say about the quality of the food.. but looking at their restaurant it must have been pretty good.. busy every evening! You don't need any meals from the hotel if you think its too expensive, you can get the best food at almost every corner of the street in Kuala Lumpur.
area: Kuala Lumpur City Centre,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Kuala Lumpur
detail: Check in was quick, even got upgraded to a bigger room.
area: Kuala Lumpur City Centre,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: Pavilion Hotel Kuala Lumpur Managed by Banyan Tree
detail: We got upgraded to a club room (with some top up) and it was the best decision ever! The normal room is fine but the view was blocked and of course it was small. We got upgraded to a suite, we got free cocktail/coffee session in the evenings, complimentary laundry for 3 pieces of clothings per day. The room was spacious with a huge bathtub which my kids really enjoyed! The breakfast spread was good and it was a different spread on both days. They had a good selection of fruits, kueh and pastries on top of the usual buffet selections. Please note that kids 6-12 years old need to pay for buffet breakfast. The location is superb. There’s a lift that takes you down to Pavilion mall which is very convenient! The only setback I found in this hotel is that the pool is not kids friendly. There’s only one infinity pool which might not be suitable for all kids. Will definitely return!
area: Bukit Bintang,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: Concorde Hotel Kuala Lumpur
detail: The Concorde Hotel in Kuala Lumpur has a wonderful central location and the price made it a real bargain. Our room was comfortable with plenty of room for us and our bags, a desk space and extra chair. The rain shower was great and the water was plentiful and hot. Another plus was the blackout curtains that really worked so that sleep was deep and refreshing. Breakfast was plentiful and varied with everything from freshly made omelettes, pancakes and waffles to traditional Malaysian and Chinese dishes as well as a good assortment of pastries and breads. The coffee was the only disappointment, it was terribly weak. Staff at the hotel were eager to help with directions and advice on restaurants and shopping. The hotel also has a very nice fitness center and a nicly sized pool. Altogether we found this a great choice for a weekend in Kuala Lumpur and would recommend it highly to anyone looking for a good central location that is comfortable, clean, well laid out and affordable.
area: Kuala Lumpur City Centre,Kuala Lumpur - View on map

name: Sunway Pyramid Hotel
detail: Known as a perfect holiday retreat, this property is simply the ultimate destination for groups of friends, family, or lovers. With the location in the heart of an amusement park, guests will be delighted to surf the world’s largest man made beach, while strolling through the longest and highest bridge in Kuala Lumpur, go riding the rollercoaster or even go shopping at the Sunway Pyramid. With Water Park, Extreme Park, Wildlife Park and Amusement Park on site, a land full of fun and excitement awaits at Sunway Pyramid Hotel @ Sunway Resort. Also, this four star property boasts 764 rooms and suites that are sophisticated and elegantly designed. Sunway Pyramid Hotel @ Sunway Resort is also brilliantly appointed and offers a swimming pool, fitness center from 6.00am to 12 midnight only, excellent variety of onsite restaurants, and they also feature an aerobics class for a good work out session. All in all, Sunway Pyramid Hotel @ Sunway Resort is a perfect hideaway from the workloads.
area: Bandar Sunway,Kuala Lumpur - View on map
